workflows.description: Retrieves a list of leaked credentials related to the organization ID based on the keyword to search, breach ID, and date-time range you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Leaked Credentials

workflows.description: Retrieves statistics related to the EASM scan related to the organization ID specified in the configuration parameters. The response includes a count of the total, online, and newly discovered assets for the current and previous scans.
workflows.name: Get Scan Statistics

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of security issues related to assets discovered in the most recent EASM scan based on the filter criteria like issue status, severity, and the country codes (US, IN) you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Issues Discovered

workflows.description: Retrieves details about a specific security issue based on the unique issue ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Issue By ID

workflows.description: Retrieves the statistics related to security issues discovered in the most recent EASM scan. The response includes a count of the total discovered issues, along with the severity-wise count.
workflows.name: Get Issue Summary

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of security issues that have been marked as either Risk Accepted or False Positive based on the asset you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Archived Issues

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of assets that have been marked as either Risk Accepted or False Positive.
workflows.name: Get Archived Assets

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of Autonomous System Numbers (ASNs) discovered in the latest EASM scan based on the asset you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Asset ASNs

workflows.description: Retrieves details about a specific Autonomous System Number(ASN) based on the asset ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get ASNs by Asset ID

routes.name: Start-> Get ASNs by Asset ID

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of domains discovered in the latest EASM scan based on the filter criteria like ports, technologies, and assets you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Domains

workflows.description: Retrieves domain details based on the asset ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Domain by Asset ID

routes.name: Start-> Get Domain by Asset ID

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of IP addresses discovered in the latest EASM scan based on the filter criteria like ports, country codes, and assets you have specified.
workflows.name: Get IPs

workflows.description: Retrieves IP address details based on the asset ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get IP by Asset ID

routes.name: Start-> Get IP by Asset ID

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of IP prefixes discovered in the latest EASM scan based on the filter criteria like ASN and assets you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Prefixes

workflows.description: Retrieves details about a specific IP prefix based on the asset ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Prefixes by Asset ID

routes.name: Start-> Get Prefixes by Asset ID

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of subdomains discovered in the latest EASM scan based on the filter criteria like ports, technologies, and assets you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Subdomains

workflows.description: Retrieves subdomain details based on the asset ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Subdomain by Asset ID

routes.name: Start-> Get Subdomain by Asset ID

workflows.description: Retrieves the statistics related to assets discovered in the most recent EASM scan. The response includes a count of the total discovered and online assets.
workflows.name: Get Asset Statistics

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of credential breaches related to the organization ID based on the keyword to search and other details you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Breaches

workflows.description: Retrieves details about a specific credential breach based on the breach ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Breaches by ID

workflows.description: Initiates the report generation for the latest EASM scan.
workflows.name: Generate Report

workflows.description: Checks the status of the generated EASM report based on the report ID you have specified. The response contains the s3 URL of the report to download if generated.
workflows.name: Get Report

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of exposed services in the latest EASM scan based on the filter criteria like asset, ports, services, and products, etc.
workflows.name: Get Exposed Services

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of cloud integrations based on the filter criteria like provider, connection_status.
workflows.name: Get Cloud Integrations

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of FortiGate integrations based on input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Get FortiGate Integrations

workflows.description: Retrieves the security insights on dns configurations for the given domain.
workflows.name: Get Security Insights

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of comments for given archived issue ID.
workflows.name: Get Archived Issue Comments

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of comments for given issue ID.
workflows.name: Get Issue Comments

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of tags based on scope, name and other parameters specified.
workflows.name: Get Tags

workflows.description: Retrieves a specific tag details based on tag ID specified.
workflows.name: Get Tag Details

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of groups based on scope, name and other parameters specified.
workflows.name: Get Groups

workflows.description: Retrieves a specific group details based on group ID specified.
workflows.name: Get Group Details

data.name: Sample - Fortinet FortiRecon EASM - 1.1.0
data.description: FortiRecon is a Digital Risk Protection Service (DRPS) product that provides an outside-the-network view to the risks posed to your enterprise.
